00066 // HISTORY:
00067 //
00068 // -Nov 21, 2007 
00069 //  A CIccXformCreator singleton class has been added to provide general
00070 //  support for dynamically creating xform classes using a xform type.
00071 //  Prototype and private xform type support can be added to the system
00072 //  by pushing additional IIccXformFactory based objects to the 
00073 //  singleton CIccXformCreator object.
00074 //
00076 
00077 #ifndef _ICCXFORMFACTORY_H
00078 #define _ICCXFORMFACTORY_H
00079 
00080 #include "IccCmm.h"
00081 #include <memory>
00082 #include <list>
00083 #include <string>
00084 
00085 //CIccXform factory support
00086 #ifdef USESAMPLEICCNAMESPACE
00087 namespace sampleICC {
00088 #endif
00089 
00099 class IIccXformFactory 
00100 {
00101 public:
00102   virtual ~IIccXformFactory() {}
00103 
00117   virtual CIccXform* CreateXform(icXformType xformType, CIccTag *pTag=NULL, CIccCreateXformHintManager* pHintManager=0)=0;
00118 };
00119 
00120 
00121 //A CIccXformFactoryList is used by CIccXformCreator to keep track of xform
00122 //creation factories
00123 typedef std::list<IIccXformFactory*> CIccXformFactoryList;
00124 
00125 
00135 class CIccBaseXformFactory : public IIccXformFactory
00136 {
00137 public:
00150   virtual CIccXform* CreateXform(icXformType xformType, CIccTag *pTag=NULL, CIccCreateXformHintManager *pHintManager=NULL);
00151 
00152 };
00153 
00154 class CIccXformCreator;
00155 
00156 typedef std::auto_ptr<CIccXformCreator> CIccXformCreatorPtr;
00157 
00167 class CIccXformCreator 
00168 {
00169 public:
00170   ~CIccXformCreator();
00171 
00185   static CIccXform* CreateXform(icXformType xformType, CIccTag *pTag=NULL, CIccCreateXformHintManager *pHintManager=NULL)
00186       { return CIccXformCreator::GetInstance()->DoCreateXform(xformType, pTag, pHintManager); }
00187 
00199   static void PushFactory(IIccXformFactory *pFactory)
00200       { CIccXformCreator::GetInstance()->CIccXformCreator::DoPushFactory(pFactory); }
00201 
00215   static IIccXformFactory* PopFactory()
00216       { return CIccXformCreator::GetInstance()->DoPopFactory(); }
00217 
00218 private:
00220   CIccXformCreator() { }
00221 
00233   static CIccXformCreator* GetInstance();
00234 
00235   CIccXform* DoCreateXform(icXformType xformType, CIccTag *pTag=NULL, CIccCreateXformHintManager *pHintManager=NULL);
00236   void DoPushFactory(IIccXformFactory *pFactory);
00237   IIccXformFactory* DoPopFactory(bool bAll=false);
00238 
00239   static CIccXformCreatorPtr theXformCreator; 
00240 
00241   CIccXformFactoryList factoryStack;
00242 };
00243 
00244 #ifdef USESAMPLEICCNAMESPACE
00245 } //namespace sampleICC
00246 #endif
00247 
00248 #endif //_ICCXFORMFACTORY_H
